summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power plant and system and authorizing an agreement with Public Utility Districts No. 1 of Chelan, Cowlitz and Douglas Counties, Public Utility District No. 2 of Grant County, the City of Tacoma, and the Eugene Water and Electric Board to coordinate utilization of energy resources and participation in governmental processes relating to such resources and superseding the agreement authorized by Ordinance 104500.
